partnerDetails.about:
Established in 2010, Integrated Energy Management Solutions Ltd (iEMS) is a provider of intelligent, integrated systems and solutions for better energy management, carbon compliance and power quality monitoring, with no impact on efficiency, sustainability or the environment.

Working with the most innovative manufacturers of market leading technology, iEMS combines both experience and capability to undertake system design and implementation of solutions from a simple meter installation to a power monitoring and control system for operation wide real-time metering of all utilities, to help your business to identify and reduce wasted and inappropriate use of energy using simple, intuitive web-based interactive tools and energy management software.

Systems are designed to suit an organization’s wants and needs at any level of the energy pyramid, from an industrial process or commercial building up to portfolio management at head office. This may be anything from a web-enabled automatic meter reading system (AMR) or energy management system (EMS) or a combination of the two to form a complete utility monitoring and targeting solution (aM&T) with input from other important business factors such as productivity, occupancy, floor area, etc.

Our service offer is flexible to fit with any element of a project and involvement at any stage, from: 

  • System design
  • Panel manufacture
  • Installation & commissioning
  • Training & Support      

iEMS has long established partnerships with high profile energy and carbon management practices to deliver end to end consultancy services that include:

Energy and Carbon Management Consultancy

  • Carbon Trust Assessments
  • EN 16001 Implementation
  • Audits and Surveys
  • Energy and Carbon Management
  • Project specific services

Compliance Services

  • Carbon Reduction Commitment
  • Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD)
  • Building Regulation (Part L) Compliance Services
  • Energy Management Systems to EN 50001
  • ESOS

Whatever your energy needs, iEMS has a solution for you and a local national service that is second to none.
